entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
